meanings.definition: Work done on a temporary basis.
meanings.sent1: Temping can provide flexibility for those seeking short-term employment.
meanings.sent2: I am currently temping at a local office while I search for a permanent job.
meanings.sent3: The company needed extra help, so they hired me for some temping.
meanings.sent4: Temping is like being a substitute player in a sports team - you fill in when needed.
meanings.sent5: Temping allows you to experience different workplaces and industries.

meanings.definition: The act of taking on temporary work assignments.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys temping during the summer months to earn extra money.
meanings.sent2: Temping can be a great way to gain experience in various fields.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I would enjoy temping, but it's actually quite interesting.
meanings.sent4: Temping is like trying different flavors of ice cream - you get to taste a bit of everything.
meanings.sent5: Temping gives you the chance to meet new people and learn new skills.
